aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.subTitle: Pioneering Automation Excellence
aboutSection.description: The Mongolian Society of Automation is dedicated to advancing automation technology adoption, providing professional development courses, improving human resources in the engineering sector, and building strong partnerships between government and private enterprises.
aboutSection.missionText: To lead the transformation of Mongolia's industrial landscape through cutting-edge automation technologies and world-class engineering education.
aboutSection.visionText: A future where every Mongolian engineer has access to the latest automation knowledge and skills.
